data.actual_result: The roles are auto-deselected when changing from portrait to landscape mode or vice versa
data.short_description: Changing from portrait to landscape mode (or vice versa) uncheck the checked roles when creating a new channel only for the selected roles
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you are admin/owner  - Create a few roles, then create a new channel - When creating the channel, select a few roles that should be able to access it - If you are on portrait mode, switch to landscape mode (or vice versa) and observe
